SEARCH

Package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.autoconfigure.audit

package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.autoconfigure.audit
Audit settings.
  • Class
    Description
    AuditEventRepositoryFactory
    For creating Redis AuditEventRepository beans.
    AuditRepositoryAutoConfiguration
    Autoconfiguration for auditing support where an AuditEventRepository is created.
    AuditRepositoryConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for auditing.
    AuditRepositoryConfigurationProperties.FileRepository
    For audit logging to a file.
    AuditRepositoryConfigurationProperties.InMemoryRepository
    For in-memory audit logging.
    AuditRepositoryConfigurationProperties.LogSystemRepository
    For using the underlying log system to handle audit events.
    AuditRepositoryConfigurationProperties.RedisRepository
    For Redis storage of audit entries.
    RedisAuditRepositoryAutoConfiguration
    Autoconfiguration for auditing support where a Redis AuditEventRepository is created.
    RedissonAuditRepositoryAutoConfiguration
    Autoconfiguration for auditing support where a Redis AuditEventRepository is created.
